articles.contents:
Enayetur Raheem
          
          
          Home
          About
          ☰
          
          
      
        
          
            Enayetur Raheem, Ph.D.
          
          
            
              I am a Real World Evidence (RWE) Data Scientist and Statistician with more than 18 years of experience in academia and industry combined. Currently, as a Principal Data Scientist, I provide strategic guidance for the use of real world data, their validations, and use of algorithms to derive real world evidence (RWE) for evaluation of drugs and biologics.
            
            
              I am a Real World Evidence (RWE) Data Scientist and Statistician with more than 18 years of experience in academia and industry combined. Currently, as a Principal Data Scientist, I provide strategic guidance for the use of real world data, their validations, and use of algorithms to derive real world evidence (RWE) for evaluation of drugs and biologics.
